NK102(ne)003:1: // sbas pa'i rgum chung gi gzhung phyi mo bzhugs so //
NK102(ne)003:2: bdud bzhi bcom nyid byang chub ldan bskyed rdzogs dang
NK102(ne)003:3: tshig dang yi ge las 'das pa 'das 'du 'bral
NK102(ne)003:4: myed pa' dpal kun tu bzang po ji bzhin ba'i
NK102(ne)003:5: klung klong du gyur pa la phyag bya zhes bya
NK102(ne)003:7: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes ji
NK102(ne)003:8: tsham tsam rtog myed kun tu bzang mo zab mo
NK102(ne)003:9: zhig che ba rnam ngar lngar yang sbyar /
NK102(ne)003:10: mye long lta bu'i ye shes blo yi yul du kun tu bzang po snang ba na /
NK102(ne)003:11: gnyis su myed pa'i byang chub kyi sems myi rtog
NK102(ne)003:12: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes zab mo bde ba
NK102(ne)003:14: so sor rtog pa' myong ba yin phyir myi rtog pa chen po de nyid myen myin /
NK102(ne)003:15: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes ji bzhin ba
NK102(ne)003:16: yi chos rig pa'i rgyal po rang lags te btsad
NK102(ne)003:17: de / stong pa chen po'i don chos la chos ni gzhan las myi 'byung myi 'jug pas /
NK102(ne)003:18: luslungdang man ngag ji tsam zab mo'i tshig sde snod brjod kyang /
NK102(ne)003:19: byang chub sems dang gol sa don dang 'tsham par ga la 'gyur /
NK102(ne)003:20: 'di man chad sgrib pa dang gnas ston /
NK102(ne)003:21: 'dus byas bsod nams ye shes stsogs pa dang /
NK102(ne)003:22: ting 'dzin bag chags sbyong ba bsam gtan gyi bde ro bde ba' dag /
NK102(ne)003:24: byang chub kyi sems dang gol sa 'dzin pa'i phur pa de na yod /
NK102(ne)003:25: bya btsal dang bral ba' 'dzin myed mkha' la bachosa bcos myed na /
NK102(ne)003:26: drang srong dang bsam gtan dkyil skyil krung rang drang 'dug bcas pa dang /
NK102(ne)003:27: rab tu 'byung ba dang dka' thub la stsogs pa' lus kyi bcos pa thams cad kyang /
NK102(ne)003:28: nga dang bdag lus rtog mngon par zhel zhen las byung /
NK102(ne)003:29: rgyu 'bras gnyis ka byang chub chen po las myed mkha' la dge sdig bcos su myed /
NK102(ne)003:30: bdal ba chen po nam mkha' lta bur ye gnas la /
NK102(ne)003:31: kun tu bzang po krung skyildrang gdug 'dug bcas pa myed /
NK102(ne)003:32: rtogs pa'i ye shes rang bzhin nam mkhar gnas pa la /
NK102(ne)003:33: rtsol ba dang bral ba nam mkha' 'gyur ba'i gzhi ma yin /
NK102(ne)003:34: kun gzhi chos nyid sems nyid nam mkha' byang chub dbyings /
NK102(ne)003:35: btsal sems dang bral ba byang chub sgrub pa'i gzhi ma yin /
NK102(ne)003:36: thog ma dang tha ma dang dbu ma dang mtha' myed do //
NK102(ne)003:37: gzhi rtsa myed pa'i sems nyid la mye 'pho chu
NK102(ne)003:38: gsod pa dang 'dra btsal bas mi rnyed ri dwags
NK102(ne)003:39: smyig smrig rgyu snyog pa' nam kha mkha' 'dra /
NK102(ne)003:40: kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin la skye dang bral ba'i byang chub la /
NK102(ne)003:41: byang chub rgyu 'bras dge sdig mtho ris dang thar pa' yongs kyis myed /
NK102(ne)003:42: lung dang man ngag gi lde mig man ngag bla na med pa sbas pa'i rgum chung rdzogs soha&a&a&a //
NK102(ne)003:43: byang chub kyi sems 'di slobs slob dpon ni mkhyen rab kyi mchog sangs rgyas sbas pas mdzad do //
NK102(ne)003:44: phyogs ni a ti yo gar gtogs so //
NK102(ne)003:45: khungs ni byang chub kyi sems kyi lung thams cad nas byung ngo //
NK102(ne)003:46: don ched ni blo yang rab kyi don ched du bka' stsal to //
NK102(ne)003:47: mgo mjug tu don rnam pa lngas ston to //
NK102(ne)003:48: sgo gatshegasa gtsigs ni ye shes drug dang /
NK102(ne)003:49: che ba rnams pa lnga dang /
NK102(ne)003:50: de kho na nyid yin pa rnam gsum gyis ston to //
NK102(ne)003:51: byang chub kyi sems 'di dpe las mtshan du gsol ba ni /
NK102(ne)003:53: don las mtshan du gsol ba ni nam ka'i mkha'i thig le'o //
NK102(ne)003:54: 'di la don rnam pa lnga ni /
NK102(ne)003:55: kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin la phyag 'tshal bar bstan pa dang gcig /
NK102(ne)003:56: byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin bstan pa dang gnyis /
NK102(ne)003:57: byang chub kyi sems kyi dpe myi dmyigs par bstan pa dang gsum /
NK102(ne)003:58: kun gzhi mkha' dbyings rnam par dag par ngo bstan pa dang bzhi /
NK102(ne)003:59: byang chub sems kyi gol sa dang sgrib pa bstan pa dang lnga'o //
NK102(ne)003:60: de la dkyus dang sbyar te ma mar bshad na /
NK102(ne)003:61: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba na phyag 'tshal lo zhes zhes zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
NK102(ne)003:63: ji tsam zhes bya ba nas chos la ni myi
NK102(ne)003:64: 'jug go zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni byang chub
NK102(ne)003:65: sems kyi rang bzhin bstan to //
NK102(ne)003:66: ji tsam zab mo zhes bya ba nas nam khar
NK102(ne)003:67: mkhar 'gyur ba'i gzhi ma yin zhes bya ba 'i
NK102(ne)003:68: ba'i bar gyis ni sgrib pa dang gnas bstan to
NK102(ne)003:69: // de nas byang chub rgyu 'bras yongs kyis myed /
NK102(ne)003:70: ces pa yan chad kyis ni kun gzhi nam mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ngo bstan pa'o //
NK102(ne)003:71: zhes snga 'gyur bka' ma'i gzhung phyi mo dang rgyab
NK102(ne)003:72: chos mtha' dag phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs te rtsis 'phrul
NK102(ne)003:73: gyi par gzhi bzhengs skabs nges pa don gyi rdzogs
NK102(ne)003:74: pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa mkhan chen bla ma
NK102(ne)003:75: mun sel gyi gus slob tha ma'i yang tha chos
NK102(ne)003:76: rdzogs chen du song yang gang zag rdzogs chen du
NK102(ne)003:77: ma song bas / rang rgyud nyon mongs pa'i phung
NK102(ne)003:78: pos 'jig rten du non na'ang cha lugs lha chos
NK102(ne)003:79: ltar bcos pa'i snyom las pa byang chub rgya mtshos
NK102(ne)003:80: slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa'i lung dang
NK102(ne)003:81: man ngag gi lde mig man ngag bla na med
NK102(ne)003:82: pa sbas pa'i rgum chung zhes tun hong gi brag
NK102(ne)003:83: phug nas 'thob pa'i gtsigs che ba 'di chos rgyun
